person.persName: James Levi (Louisville, Kentucky, painter and lightning rod manufacturer)

body.p: Louisville, Kentucky, painter and lightning rod manufacturer. Kentucky native. Married to Miranda Levi. Father of Charles E. Levi and Amanda Levi. Married to Jane Amanda Courtenay Levi in Jefferson County, Kentucky, on January 30, 1856. Father of Jennie Levi. Painter in Louisville, Kentucky, in 1850. Lightning rod manufacturer in Louisville in 1860. Lightning rod manufacturer in Louisville in 1861. Painter in Jefferson County in 1863.
